page.title: 03VILLAGE LIFE MRS DORMAN.
page.content: Mrs Dorman has enjoyed living in the village because it is a nice friendly village.She also likes the village because there are plenty of things to do.She has lived in the village for 16 years.Her dog Nem has had 61 puppies. Nem has stopped breeding dogs so she has got a new dog called Cola.Mrs Dorman has been breeding dogs for 7 years.Mrs Dorman goes to Market Harborough for the guide dogs.They have fetes for the blind.She worked for thirteen and a half years as school cook.She worked down at the chapel.Mrs Dorman thinks that it is very rewarding to work for the guide dogs.She likes working for the guide dogs because she likes to think that other blind people are going to have freedom.The dogs are more like pets to the blind people than working dogs.The guide dogs can go to 7 other places.
